Item ID12601

The ring of the gods is a ring dropped by Vet'ion. Despite its name, it does not provide any protection from monsters in the God Wars Dungeon and the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon.

It can be imbued, with the holy wrench in inventory, for 650,000 Nightmare Zone reward points or 260 Soul Wars Zeal Tokens, giving it an additional +4 prayer bonus as well as the effect of the holy wrench when equipped.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+1+1+1+1+1
 Other bonusesSlot

Item sources[edit | edit source]

SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Vet'ion454 11/512

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 August 2016
(update | poll)

The prayer bonus was changed from +3 to +4 (with the imbued ring changed from +4 to +8) to make it more competitive with the ring of suffering (i).

21 May 2015
(update | poll)

The Ring of the Gods can now be imbued at Nightmare Zone for 650,000 points with a holy wrench in inventory.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Early models for the Wilderness rings by Mod Alfred.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The ring seems to have a recoloured divine sigil attached to it.

[[File:Ring of the gods detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''ring of the gods''' is a ring dropped by [[Vet'ion]]. Despite its name, it does '''not''' provide any protection from monsters in the [[God Wars Dungeon]] and the [[Wilderness God Wars Dungeon]].

It can be [[Ring of the gods (i)|imbued]], with the [[holy wrench]] in inventory, for 650,000 [[Nightmare Zone]] reward points or 260 [[Soul Wars]] [[Zeal Tokens]], giving it an additional +4 prayer bonus as well as the effect of the [[holy wrench]] when equipped.
